topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553f90506368723dbb6c1d00#post_553f90506368723dbb6c1d00
If I don't have a license, I just plan on driving safely without one. Avoid all hazards, no getting drunk, stuff like that.

To be truthful, I wanted a motorcyclist's license, not a driver's license. My mom won't let me because she doesn't like motorcycles and prefers me driving her to places even though she could do it herself.
